title: Contact Form with Validation
description:
Add Contact Page with Form Validation and Spam Prevention

Create a fully functional contact page that allows users to submit inquiries through a validated form with comprehensive error handling and spam protection.

Requirements:

Form Fields:
- Name (text input, required)
- Email (email input, required, must validate email format)
- Phone (tel input, optional, validate format if provided)
- Business Name (text input, optional)
- Project Type (dropdown/select, required, with predefined options)
- Budget Range (dropdown/select or radio buttons, required, with predefined ranges)
- Message (textarea, required, minimum character count)

Validation:
- Implement client-side validation for all required fields
- Display inline error messages adjacent to invalid fields
- Show real-time validation feedback as user completes fields
- Prevent form submission if validation fails
- Validate email format using standard email regex
- Validate phone format based on expected format (specify country/region)
- Ensure dropdown selections are made (not default/placeholder values)

Spam Prevention:
- Add honeypot field (hidden from legitimate users, styled off-screen)
- Reject submissions if honeypot field contains data
- Consider time-based validation (reject submissions completed too quickly)

Accessibility:
- Associate all form inputs with proper <label> elements
- Use aria-describedby for error message association
- Ensure proper tab order through form fields
- Include focus indicators for keyboard navigation
- Use semantic HTML form elements
- Ensure sufficient color contrast for error messages

User Feedback:
- Display success message after successful submission
- Show error state if submission fails (network error, server error)
- Disable submit button and show loading state during submission
- Clear form after successful submission or provide option to submit another
- Make success/error messages screen reader accessible

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Handle special characters in text inputs
- Prevent double-submission with disabled button state
- Handle network timeout scenarios
- Validate data length limits to prevent overflow
- Consider GDPR/privacy notice if collecting personal data
